category.title: Volunteer Action
category.description: Someone assisted another person or group, free of charge

category.title: Donation
category.description: Money or a Gift provided to a stranger

category.title: Uncommon Courtesy
category.description: Holding the door, Using a turn signal or allowing a pedestrian to cross the street.

category.title: Pleasantry
category.description: Smiling at a stranger, waving at a school bus

category.title: Heroism
category.description: Saving one from injury or death.
